Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、<Annie>、この地上絵は 巨人が描いたんだってな。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Annie>, I heard that this geoglyph was drawn by giants.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何言ってるんですか？ 巨人なんているわけないじゃないですか。
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about? Isn't there no such thing as giants?

Entry.JapaneseText: ははーん、さては知らないな？ 古代カレギア人はすごくでっかくてだな……
Entry.EnglishText: Haha... I take it you're not in the know? Ancient Callegeans were freakin' huge...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>さん、まさかその話、本気で……？ だまされたフリをしてたんじゃないんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, don't tell me you sincerely believed that...? Weren't you just pretending to be gullible?
